# Pre-approval Checklist
 - [ ] Assigned a reviewer
 - [ ] Added appropriate metadata (tags, labels, projects, etc)
 - [ ] Resolved any merge conflicts
 - [ ] Formatted your code

 # Post-approval Checklist
 - [ ] Resolved all out-standing suggestions
 - [ ] Assigned someone to merge (by tagging them here, in the comments, or with out-of-band communication)
 - [ ] Created any new tasks or features for any follow ups
 - [ ] Deleted feature branch after merge
